extension.author: Osiris Team
extension.description: Detect html snippet and show it, eventually with user authorization.
extension.content:
Syntax: insert the HTML generated by services/widgets between \[html] tags.
Example, YouTube video: [code][html] <iframe width="853" height="510" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ot1Hds6JkBE?hd=1" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe> [/html][/code]
extension.name: OML Html Snippet
